title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building a Cloud-Native Risk Decisioning Platform for Resilience (AIM273)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建云原生风险决策平台以实现韧性 (AIM273)
abstract: Capital One’s governance, risk and compliance platform represents a leap in risk management—built natively on AWS to deliver real-time decisioning, regulatory compliance, & enterprise resilience. While many financial institutions are just beginning to move from on-prem to cloud, Capital One is already ahead. In this session, leaders Solomon Francis & Matt Davis share how they built a GRC platform from the ground up on AWS using Bedrock, SageMaker, & S3. The platform demonstrates how a cloud-native platform can future-proof financial institutions against rising risk & compliance demands. This session offers practical lessons in designing & building risk platform in AWS. This presentation is brought to you by PwC, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: Capital One的治理、风险与合规平台代表了风险管理的飞跃——原生构建于AWS之上，可提供实时决策、监管合规性和企业韧性。当许多金融机构刚刚开始从本地部署迁移到云端时，Capital One已经遥遥领先。在本次会议中，领导者Solomon Francis和Matt Davis分享了他们如何使用Bedrock、SageMaker和S3在AWS上从零开始构建GRC平台。该平台展示了云原生平台如何使金融机构能够应对不断增长的风险与合规需求。本次会议提供了在AWS中设计和构建风险平台的实用经验。本演示由AWS合作伙伴PwC提供。
